headline: Did Colgate-Palmolive’s (CL) WHO Oral Health Alliance Just Recast Its Sustainability Investment Narrative?
summary: Colgate-Palmolive recently announced a four-year collaboration with the WHO Foundation to support the World Health Organization’s oral health initiatives, including education, integration into national health systems, and broader public awareness. This partnership underscores how a global consumer brand is aligning closely with public health priorities, potentially strengthening its profile on sustainability and social responsibility. We’ll now explore how this expanded WHO Foundation...
